's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing," Kirsten Gillibrand told NBC's Meet The Press program. It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury, she added. The 40-year-old Gabrielle Giffords has survived despite being shot through the head from point-blank range a week ago and remains in critical condition. your home each morning and is hard not to like and easy to keep watching. He is David Letterman 's favorite butt of jokes, but even that notorious crank regards him with genuine, touching affection. , and questioned why everybody is so obsessed with Facebook and Google. Eric Schmidt , who is stepping down from the CEO spot in April to focus on the company's relationships with partners and regulators, told Adam Lashinsky Microsoft has more cash, more engineers, more global reach. We see competition from Microsoft every day. He also noted that Facebook has never stated ambitions to get into search, and that Facebook ads don't displace Google's ads. He's right in a narrow sense: Microsoft is the only company

to running for governor' Saying "we choose Indiana," U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana governor's office. I'm open to running for governor, Mike Pence said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star. "We're going to take the next several months to travel across the state and hear what Hoosiers have to say. We'll seriously consider it.

Packers ahead 7-0 on their way to a 21-14 victory. "He's like a very good scorer in basketball- you know he's going to get points," Steelers defensive coordinator Dick LeBeau said. From a defensive standpoint, you've got to keep him from controlling the game and monopolizing the game. That's what we have to try and do with Aaron Rodgers . He's a great player. He can create, improvise with his feet, go to his second and third choice in the route because he has such a quick release. Ben Roethlisberger isn't as speedy as Aaron Rodgers or Michael Vick nor as statuesque as Tom Brady and Peyton Manning ; he just makes it work. SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. "I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate." Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least

a decade ago when investors called for a more experienced business leader, prompting Mr Eric Schmidt , 55, to take over. But now the company is reverting to the old arrangement and Mr Eric Schmidt said: In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. "For the last ten years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. We're mobile! Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said.
